div.em: Current conditions as of 22 Apr 09:53 am CDT

div.div: Showers and thunderstorms likely, mainly before 1pm. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 73. Windy, with a south southwest wind 13 to 18 mph becoming northwest 23 to 28 mph in the afternoon. Winds could gust as high as 39 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New rainfall amounts of less than a tenth of an inch, except higher amounts possible in thunderstorms.
Mostly cloudy, then gradually becoming clear, with a low around 50. Northwest wind 17 to 22 mph decreasing to 9 to 14 mph after midnight. Winds could gust as high as 31 mph.
Sunny, with a high near 82. West northwest wind 6 to 10 mph.

div.div: Your session will expire in 0 minutes.

div.h3: Free meals for Sayre kids during the school closure!

span.b: FREE! Grab n' Go meals for Sayre kids during the school closure!
Tuesday we will be having a muffin & yogurt for breakfast,
hot ham & cheese toaster & fruit for lunch; each meal comes with white milk & a chocolate milk

Sayre Schools is excited to announce that student meals (breakfast and lunch) will be offered free of charge to Sayre children during the state-mandated school closure. All children 1 to 18 years old are eligible for the meals beginning Monday, March 23rd.
The breakfast/lunch packs will be distributed at two locations: Sayre Elementary (drive-through service) and Sayre First Baptist Church (walk-up service)
Sorry, but social distancing guidelines will not allow for sit down service.
If circumstances do not allow for meals to be picked up, please contact Jenni Easter at (580)928-5531 or jeaster@sayre.k12.ok.us
